168 class NAVICO_SDK_EXPORT tRadarTargetTrailBuffer
169 {
170 private:
171  bool m_TrailsOn;
172  bool m_TrailsContinuous;
173

179  int32_t m_TrailsCounter;
180  int32_t m_TrailsCountdown;
181

183 
184  int32_t m_TrailsTime;
185 
186  uint8_t *m_pBuffer;
187 
188  uint16_t m_nOfSamples;
189  uint16_t m_nOfAzimuths;
190 
191 public:
192  tRadarTargetTrailBuffer( uint16_t nOfSamples, uint16_t nOfAzimuths );
193  virtual ~tRadarTargetTrailBuffer();
194 
195  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
198  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
199  inline uint8_t *GetBufferAzimuth( uint16_t azimuth ) { assert( azimuth < m_nOfAzimuths ); return &m_pBuffer[m_nOfSamples * azimuth]; }
200 
201  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
204  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
205  inline bool GetTrailsOn( void ) const { return m_TrailsOn; }
206 
207  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
211  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
212  void SetTrailsTime( int32_t time_sec ); // time_sec = 0: it means off, time_sec = -1: it means infinite
213 
214  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
218  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
219  int32_t GetTrailsTime( void ) const { return m_TrailsTime; } // time_sec = 0: it means off, time_sec = -1: it means infinite
220 
221  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
224  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
225  void UpdateTrails( void ); // Need to be called every new scan
226 
227  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
230  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
231  uint16_t *GetScanIntegrationPointer( void ) { return &silutIndex; }
232 
233 };
